Pre-Game Insights: England's attacking situation is further complicated by Jack Grealish's own fitness problem
Carsley's decision to go without a recognised striker on Thursday backfired spectacularly
Conor Gallagher in midfield would not go amiss
Levi Colwill, Rico Lewis and Jordan Pickford should all continue in defence
Miscellaneous Highlights: England suffered their first defeat under interim head coach Lee Carsley on Thursday evening, a shock 2-1 home loss versus Greece
Captain Harry Kane missed that match with the knock he sustained while on duty for Bayern Munich last weekend
Others: England possible starting lineup: Pickford; Walker, Guehi, Colwill, Lewis; Rice, Gallagher; Palmer, Bellingham, Gordon; Watkins
